properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 13 at 8:28AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the Black Warrior River At Oliver
Lock and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Black Warrior River At Selden
Lock and Dam...

.Flooding continues along the lower Black Warrior River following
the recent heavy rainfall...and a flood warning remains in effect at
Oliver Lock and Dam and Selden Lock and Dam.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam.
* until further notice...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 8:15 AM Thursday the stage was 103.3 feet.
* Flood stage is 90 feet.
* Moderate flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 103.5 feet by
this evening and then begin falling.
* Impact...At 105 feet...Severe residential flooding occurs in the
area...and evacuations may become necessary. At 102 feet...
Residential flooding begins in the area. Numerous cabins and
trailers in Hale and Greene counties become flooded.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Friday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
